Package controllers

Class AbstractController

java.lang.Object
controllers.AbstractController
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractOrderController, ApproveCustomersController, ChooseReportController, ConnectionController, CreateCustomerController, CreateResupplyRequestController, CustomerDeliveriesController, CustomerPanelController, CustomerReportController, CustomerServiceController, DeliveryOperatorController, DeliveryOrdersController, EditUserController, LoginController, ManageInventoryController, MarketingEmployeeController, MarketingManagerController, OperationEmpController, OrderReportController, OrderReportPanelController, PickupFormController, RegionManagerMainScreenController, ResupplyReqController, RunningSaleController, SaleInitiateFormController, SaleTemplateCreationController, StockStatusReportController, UpdateMinLimitController, UserPanelController
public abstract class AbstractController extends Object
Super abstract class for all controllers All the controllers inherit from this class and the method start
